title: I want to know what font is the first letter "C" (brand: Chiclets)
author: Susana Bento

comments.content:
Custom letter design for the \_C\_. Could have been made by taking an \_e\_ with a sloped cross bar and adding a tilde. Or by adding the cross bar to a \_c\_.  
Don

Will be???

[http://www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-8%20%...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317115926/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-8%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Vinque%20-%20Regular&fstyle=i&fsize=60&fid=214ca8e7ee4e4d9fd0d8fa49625f3f81&wrap=2&text=C "http://www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-8%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Vinque%20-%20Regular&fstyle=i&fsize=60&fid=214ca8e7ee4e4d9fd0d8fa49625f3f81&wrap=2&text=C")

With cross and tilde ?

Should work. For a closer fit push the curve on the lower rhs out a little bit, thicken the curve and make the terminal tip horizontal.  
Don
